name: Karaoke! at the end of the world
name_original: Karaoke! at the end of the world
description:
Made in less than 48hours for Ludum Dare 50! A little janky but a lot of fun!

  1. Boot up the game
  2. It will automatically create a folder in ‘My Documents’ called karaoke
  3. Put all the .wav files you’d like to tap to
  4. Press play and pick a song! Wait for the green arrow and until you can hear the preview and then go for it!
  5. have FUN!
    Robin x
